TopicTitle: Alternate solar systems in the skybox

Articles.Content: The skybox has 6 pictures right? So then for each "picture" this is one alternate solar system with new planets. This way you have 7 news solar systems and you visit it you need to "aim" for that specific skybox

35 minutes ago, SnailsAttack said:

what?

What I mean is that if you have your skybox with 6 pictures each each "picture" will act as a "portal" to another system it would take thousands of Kerbal years to go yes when I say portal its just the change in the primroses gravity field, more specifically the neutral ground.

normal Kerbal solar system<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<| |>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> new solar system

the arrows represent the primary pull of gravity toward the center of that solar system 

the area in between the two lines is "interstellar space. All I did was shorten it so it would only take a few thousand years to get their instead of millions (it is a game after all) 

 

I've gone into interstellar space with a probe it would be nice if it actually ended up somewhere.

If we wanted to be realistic it would be more like this

kerbal solar system<|                                                                                                                 |>new solar system

but that would take FOREVER so the smaller window instead
There are mods that add other solar systems. No need to do some fancy skybox trick
Moreover, the skybox is not a physical object and has no location. You can't collide with it.
